bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of sudden awaking from a nightmare with palpitation and panic. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 14: 大 定心湯，治心氣虛悸，恍惚多忘，或夢驚魘，志少不足方 , “The ‘decoction to massively calm down an [excited] heart’ is a recipe to cure heart qi depletion [resulting in] palpitation, absent-mindedness with frequent forgetfulness, or being startled , in one’s dreams, by nightmare demons , with mental deficits”.
